message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. Can you consider this offer?
